data.title: Book: The Stainless Steel Rat by Harry Harrison
data.meta_description: In the vastness of space, the crimes just get bigger and Slippery Jim diGriz, the Stainless Steel Rat, is the biggest criminal of them all. He can con humans, aliens and any number of robots time...
data.text:
The Stainless Steel Rat by Harry Harrison

July 11, 2024 5:40 AM - Subscribe

In the vastness of space, the crimes just get bigger and Slippery Jim diGriz, the Stainless Steel Rat, is the biggest criminal of them all. He can con humans, aliens and any number of robots time after time. Jim is so slippery that all the inter-galactic cops can do is make him one of their own.

About FanFare

FanFare is a pop culture discussion site for TV, movies, podcasts, and books. Any MetaFilter member can post a thread about a piece of media for other members to discuss.
